amendment.description: To require the Secretary to submit a report to Congress addressing its compliance with the recommendations from July 6, 2006 Inspector General Report "Progress in Developing the National Asset Database".

vote.text: Amendment SA 4671 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4671 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S7496-7497; text: CR S7496) To require the Secretary to submit a report to Congress addressing its compliance with the recommendations from July 6, 2006 Inspector General Report "Progress in Developing the National Asset Database".
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4671 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4671 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Schumer.
